props.activeClass: The **active-class** applied to children when they are activated.
props.alignWithTitle: Make `v-tabs` lined up with the toolbar title
props.backgroundColor: Changes the background color of the component.
props.centerActive: Forces the selected tab to be centered
props.cycle: Will reset to first or last tab when swiping left or right if at the end of indexes
props.dark: Applies the dark theme variant to the component. You can find more information on the Material Design documentation for [dark themes](https://material.io/design/color/dark-theme.html).
props.grow: Force `v-tab`'s to take up all available space
props.height: Sets the height of the tabs bar
props.iconsAndText: Will stack icon and text vertically
props.light: Applies the light theme variant to the component.
props.mobileBreakpoint: Sets the designated mobile breakpoint for the component.
props.optional: Does not require an active item. Useful when using `v-tab` as a `router-link`
props.reverseTransition: The transition used when the component is reversing items. Can be one of the [built in transitions](/styles/transitions) or one your own.
props.showArrows: Show pagination arrows if the tab items overflow their container. For mobile devices, arrows will only display when using this prop.
props.sliderColor: Changes the background color of an auto-generated `v-tabs-slider`
props.sliderSize: Changes the size of the slider, **height** for horizontal, **width** for vertical.
props.transition: Sets the component transition. Can be one of the [built in transitions](/styles/transitions) or one your own.
props.vertical: Stacks tabs on top of each other vertically.

events.change: Emitted when tab is changed by user interaction
